title: The Zeithouse 1/12: Spironolactone, Matt Gaetz, Boris Johnson, The Batman, Biden, 'Cheer'
itunes:title: The Zeithouse 1/12: Spironolactone, Matt Gaetz, Boris Johnson, The Batman, Biden, 'Cheer'
description:
In this edition of The Zeithouse, Jack and Miles discuss anti-vaxxers force-femming themselves, Matt Gaetz's ex-GF testifying in court, Lula da Silva running for president of Brazil, Boris Johnson's BYOB parties, Batfans being pissed the new Batman movie is PG-13, Biden's approval rating dipping, and the trailer for 'Cheer' S2

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
